roomTip: Have tea in their library which over looks the lake.
text:
Beautiful hotel in a serene setting.

This hotel is stunning with a beautiful pool that overlooks a lake with a couple of baby crocodiles ! In July the hotel was not busy which meant we had the pool mostly to ourselves on the two days we stayed there. Staff and food were great. We stayed half board but the restaurants are a la carte. 

We had a pool villa which was simply amazing, really large with large bathtub and seperate shower with roof window.

We had a private butler but didn’t use much as we were out most of the time. 

Minerva national park is nearby.

roomTip: You’ll need mosquito spray but we barely saw a mosquito - we were worried about this before coming but didn’t need to be
text:
We stayed for five nights at this hotel for our honeymoon. We honestly cannot fault our experience at all. 
Upon arrival, we were introduced to our INCREDIBLE butler Thasara and then had a quick tour of the hotel. We were then taken to our room. We stayed in a paddy dwelling with pool which was very spacious, clean and attractive. As the hotel has around 30 ish places to stay, the ratio of staff to visitors is amazing so therefore additional services are very quick (e.g organising trips or food/drink to the room). 
We took advantage of the Loris Walk with the absolutely brilliant and knowledgeable Yesi  (resident zoologist) which was really informative and a lot of fun. We saw a Slender Loris, Wolf Spider and a lizard. Thasara also helped us organise trips to Sigiriya Rock, an elephant safari and to Dambulla Cave Temple - the hotel is fantastically located for all of these. Each trip that was organised through the hotel had Yesi present, drinks provided by the hotel and what seemed like endless cold flannels! We then had an additional person as a tour guide and transport was also included (& was seamless). 
Dinner was really good every day and we also enjoyed our breakfast there. We didn’t have to wait at all - service was very quick and faultless. The dishes are presented beautifully and tasted great. Dinner was around four courses each night and breakfast was about the same (they were huge). In terms of drinks, we enjoyed them - we tried both the wine and cocktails. 
We had many special touches during our stay including a private dining experience by the pool, a floral bath for when we got back from a dusty elephant safari, a champagne breakfast - Thasara our butler organised these brilliantly and we cannot thank him enough for everything he did for us. We would absolutely love to revisit one day as we loved it so much.
title: The Best Hotel We Have Ever Stayed In

roomTip: Choose dwellings on stilts over the marshes or water
text:
We stayed in two garden dwellings in this luxury eco resort for three nights during our tour of Sri Lanka. The hotel itself is set in a beautiful location (inspired by Barnes Wetlands for those of you in the London/UK area). 

Pros 
Gorgeous surroundings 
An emphasis on biodiversity and protecting the amazing flora & fauna 
Sustainability is considered ie no plastic bottles for water & recycled toilet tissue 
Spacious room with a large bathroom, powerful rain shower and patio area
Complementary water & tea/coffee in room 
Extremely professional, hard working & helpful staff
Butler service  
Amazing breakfast - no buffet in sight 
Resident mugger crocodile who we saw in the lake every morning 
Regular sightings of tufted gray langur monkeys (we chanced upon a monkey convention one day where there were a group of around 20 monkeys!
Evening nature tour - we saw two adult loris and a baby 
Excellent serving of rooms each day 
Turn down service 
Fantastic pool 

Word of caution 
This resort is only really suitable for people who are happy to fully embrace nature.  
We regularly encountered monkeys, monitor lizards, frogs, small lizards and various bugs such as red ants. My daughters had frogs in their bathroom. 

All in all an incredible and unforgettable experience.
title: Stunning Eco resort

placeInfo: {'id': '642314', 'name': 'Jetwing Vil Uyana', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 2489, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.930625, 'longitude': 80.72074, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d642314-Reviews-Jetwing_Vil_Uyana-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.jetwinghotels.com/jetwingviluyana/', 'address': 'Rangirigama, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Rangirigama', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 11, 'count2': 30, 'count3': 75, 'count4': 343, 'count5': 2031}}
roomTip: Call ahead to get any special requests handled. Email will not cut it. Avoid going here as a large group.
text:
I picked Jetwing Vil Uyana for a family trip based on a recommendation. The last time I was in the area we stayed at Uga Ullagala and given the similar pricing I had similar expectations. 

Check-in: experience was terrible. We arrived in a bus and sat in the parking lot while the staff figured out what to do with us and our luggage. It took a long time for us to get settled. When I booked I had notified Jetwing staff via email that I made two bookings but they even up to the day prior to arrival there was confusion. I was as disappointed that we were placed in rooms so far away from each other. When we arrived at our room they were still doing some construction work and we sat around waiting for the workers to leave so we could have some privacy. 

Food: breakfast and dinner service was slow. For our party size we had to commit 2 hours to a meal. There was also a bunch of confusion as the wait staff needed help knowing which seat to serve the food / drink orders. Quality of food was mixed. Some items were very good while others were poorly cooked and/or poorly plated. Again for the price paid, it did not meet expectations. Our guide also mentioned the food in their quarters was not good and that the hotel was experiencing chef issues. At this price point it should never happen. 

Drinks: the quality of drinks at the bar were poor. I have traveled extensively in Sri Lanka. We ordered every signature cocktail. Except for the 114 (which was phenomenal) everything else was terrible. So we had to resort to beer orders. 

Rooms: The rooms are very large, we stayed in one with a pool and had a great time overall despite the challenges. We enjoyed the morning view and hosting our family for pool parties. It was great. That said there were many rough edges - shoddy construction, termite droppings, unstable floors and railings;  all expected for a dwelling in the forest, but at this price point if Uga can figure it out, not sure why Jetwing cannot. 

Common areas: setting, lobby and main areas were just gorgeous. Spent hours watching the sun go up and down, the lake flora and fauna as well as the daily crocodile sighting. This is truly a special place to disconnect  

Staff: these hardworking folks are the saving grace of the hotel. If not for them it would be a 1 star rating. Saman is a standout. I had a last minute request to make an anniversary special, not only did he create a bouquet himself, but he also made the turndown service special and tried his very best to get a cake ordered from the kitchen. Nandhana was also very helpful as he tried to speed up food service and manage our experience given the limitations he had to work with. 

Unfortunately we will not be staying at this hotel or any other Jetwing property again.
title: Disappointed by Jetwing’s best hotel in SL

text:
Absolutely loved this hotel. Quiet, tranquil location right in the heart of the farmland around Dambulla area of Sri Lanka. We had one of their honeymoon bungalows (despite it not being our honeymoon) and it was spacious, the ambience of the room felt like we were on a retreat. Forest views and we had our own private plunge pool with sunbeds so that we could relax and read without any disturbance.

The food was amazing too, loved the breakfast and dined there every night. All the staff were warm, friendly and delight. Would definitely recommend, and if I am lucky to visit  Sri Lanka again, this would be very much on my list to stay again!

Perfect location if you want to climb up Sigiriya Rock, go see wild Elephants at Minneriya Sanctuary and for the Dambulla Cave Temples.
title: A retreat feel, a pure tranquil environment + a great location for activities in that region- Loved it!

text:
We just left this amazing hotel and while we are excited to see more of Sri Lanka, we are sad to leave it behind.  Upfront I want to highlight their naturalist Yesitha, with whom we did all our tours...just such a nice, knowledgeable, wonderful guide.  We did three Cultural Triangle tours with him, and also an elephant safari at Minneriya National Park and he made them all come alive.  And Ravi, our butler, who was always there when we needed him, he made our stay so memorable, always checking that everything was ok and offering more services if we needed them.  He even set us a special table next to the pool our last night as a surprise...wow, above and beyond!  We also had wonderful spa services there at such a reasonable price, my husband had two massages :) 

We were very unsure of what to expect in Sri Lanka.  This hotel was our first stop and it has set the bar high.  It is a little out of the way, but that is a plus as you really feel surrounded by the natural beauty of Sri Lanka while you are there.  We were greeted with welcome beverages, check-in was a breeze and although we were the only ones on the property at the time, they served us lunch with full service as if the restaurant was packed.  Our room was lovely (we stayed in an overwater room), we actually took pictures of it for future reference should we ever build a new master bedroom!  The A/C worked great, shower/bath top notch and it was overall very serene.  We had one critter in the middle of the night (not sure what), but the next day the staff came and found a tiny gap and filled it right in...we are in the jungle after all...to be expected.  The food was top tier as well and they actually make a mean margarita!

I could go on and on, but suffice to say, we loved it.  If you are looking for a party place, this isn't it.  If you are looking for top-notch staff, food, rooms, service, proximity to many amazing cultural and natural spots, and an idilic spot to come back to, this is it.
title: A magical stay

placeInfo: {'id': '642314', 'name': 'Jetwing Vil Uyana', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 2489, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.930625, 'longitude': 80.72074, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d642314-Reviews-Jetwing_Vil_Uyana-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.jetwinghotels.com/jetwingviluyana/', 'address': 'Rangirigama, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Rangirigama', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 11, 'count2': 30, 'count3': 75, 'count4': 343, 'count5': 2031}}
text: Just back from spending 2 nights in a Paddy dwelling with pool at Jetwing Vil Uyana. The villa was spacious with a big bath tub, shower, and balcony overlooking the paddy fields in the hotel. Small things like hats, slippers, mosquito repellent, torch and even sarongs to wear were appreciated. We especially loved the plunge pool which we made use of several times a day. Each villa is placed in such a way which ensures privacy. Also enjoyed walking around the massive property and seeing the many peacocks and monkeys and also the crocodile who came for breakfast. The main building was beautiful. The staff cleaned the villa and restocked both in morning and evening. Our personal butler Saman was very friendly and helpful. He showed us the hotel farm where the food we ate is grown. The restaurant meals were fine dining and each dish was delicious and beautifully prepared. The staff were extremely friendly and also very good at their job. Only change I would suggest is putting a door to the toilet. A huge thank you to the hotel for allowing us to charge our electric car free of charge. We definitely recommend the hotel and would love to return one day.
title: Beautiful unique experience

placeInfo: {'id': '642314', 'name': 'Jetwing Vil Uyana', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 2489, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.930625, 'longitude': 80.72074, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d642314-Reviews-Jetwing_Vil_Uyana-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.jetwinghotels.com/jetwingviluyana/', 'address': 'Rangirigama, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Rangirigama', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 11, 'count2': 30, 'count3': 75, 'count4': 343, 'count5': 2031}}
text:
General points 
- We stayed at Jetwing for a week which was likely too long given it is quite a remote location. 
- Staff tried very hard to accommodate, but ultimately not suitable for a baby (we went with an 8 month old) 

Pros
- Service was exceptional. Sometimes could even be slightly too attentive but likely due to off season (and not an issue) 
- Our butler went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable ans enjoyable. He was also a gentile and lovely man. 
- Mama crocodile in the lake who visits at breakfast (all very safe) 
- Location, pool, spa, and rooms were amazing, very much set in remote nature (quite far away from humanity) 
- Food was as good as elite restaurants in Central London, quite remarkable 
- Bathtub was absolutely spectacular. 

Cons
- No door for the toilet. Although living in nature, would have been good to have some kind of privacy for the toilet in the room 
- We booked the tours through the hotel which were poor quality and overpriced. The resident naturalist was the primary tour guide who was a little strange with poor English, who admitted he knew nothing about Buddhism when we visited the temple of the tooth relic. Not sure why he was positioned as the tour guide. 
- We eventually asked for a proper tour guide for the final excursion which was evidently poorly planned when we were desperate for lunch and ended going to a random hotel with a buffet with flies everywhere
title: Great staff and location, not suitable for a baby

text: This was our first time staying at an eco resort. We didn’t quite know what to expect, but turned out we were thoroughly impressed and surprised. Ruwan, our butler, made sure we had everything catered for: our tour to Lion Rock, our breakfast in late morning, our night walk around hotel property searching for loris, dinners/snacks… he was the star of our stay! Our room was spacious and we appreciated the little dip pool to cool off the heat. We just had to adjust one expectation given this is an eco resort, which is the insect situation. There are many ants (which didn’t bother us), some lizards (which did) and we found a large dead cockroach at the foot of our bed in the morning (which gave us a bit of fright). A small tale in an otherwise wonderful experience overall!
title: Excellent eco resort next to the Lion Rock

text: Very nice hotel featuring central complex with pool restaurant bar. Accommodation is around the lake in the form of large traditional wooden chalets. title: Very nice place to stay. Great staff

placeInfo: {'id': '642314', 'name': 'Jetwing Vil Uyana', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 2489, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.930625, 'longitude': 80.72074, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d642314-Reviews-Jetwing_Vil_Uyana-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.jetwinghotels.com/jetwingviluyana/', 'address': 'Rangirigama, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Rangirigama', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 11, 'count2': 30, 'count3': 75, 'count4': 343, 'count5': 2031}}
roomTip: Avoid Room 135
text: We were booked into this hotel by a tour company. We stayed 2 nights in Forest Dwelling Room 133 and several days later returned for another two nights in Forest Dwelling Room 135. The rooms were identical except the second room was missing the flashlight, the mosquito net around the bed, and the safe never worked despite alerting our "butler" to that fact. The pool had leaves in it when we arrived and more when we left two days later. Our first night in the second stay in Room 135 upon returning from dinner we found two piles of excrement on the floor of the downstairs bathroom space. We called housekeeping who came to clean the floor. He said bats came in because we had turned off the lights, however, when you go to dinner you take the keys with you which causes the lights to go off. We never had this unfortunate experience in Room 133. It felt like the staff had simply forgotten about Room 135 and us. The hotel restaurant has many choices for breakfast, lunch, and dinner and the restaurant staff were always helpful and pleasant. The hotel's site and landscaping is lovely.
title: Two different rooms and two different experiences

text: Had a fantastic time at the Jetwing Vil Uyana, the accommodation was excellent and the staff could not have done more for us. The hotel is in a secluded location, in a managed jungle setting with abundant wildlife and is within easy reach by taxi of Dambulla and Sigiriya. placeInfo: {'id': '642314', 'name': 'Jetwing Vil Uyana', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 2489, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.930625, 'longitude': 80.72074, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d642314-Reviews-Jetwing_Vil_Uyana-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.jetwinghotels.com/jetwingviluyana/', 'address': 'Rangirigama, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Rangirigama', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 11, 'count2': 30, 'count3': 75, 'count4': 343, 'count5': 2031}}
text:
This is an amazing hotel! Sadly we initially didn’t get to see the best of it. The first thing to note is that this hotel is very much about being at one with nature - all of the bathrooms are open and so wildlife will be a part of your stay - it’s a unique dynamic and something to be aware of when booking. It’s a very large site and most of the rooms need to be accessed via a golf buggy at night. 
Sadly we arrived later than planned and in the dark which was disorienting given the size of the hotel and meant our check-in was chaotic. When we arrived we found our bathroom full of ants and then discovered the air conditioner was spitting dead ants across our bed. When we reported this issue it was resolved very quickly and the staff took the problem very seriously. We were moved to a lovely new room where the staff went above and beyond to make the rest of our stay amazing. 
The food was great and fine dining in style - the breakfast is something special. The staff are very helpful and friendly and went out of their way to help us celebrate our recent marriage, decorating our room and presenting us with a lovely cake as we were leaving.  The site itself is truly amazing and we saw a monitor lizard, monkeys and the resident crocodile! Being woken by the peacocks was lovely. A great stay despite the hiccups and we hope to be back to experience more on our next trip to Sri Lanka!
title: Incredible experience in a unique hotel

roomTip: Don't freak out if you have any insects or frogs etc in your room.  You are in a natural environment.
text: Our stay at Sigirya Jungles Hotel was so relaxing especially after a day exploring Anuradhapura then climbing Sigirya Rock and a visit to Poloonnaruwa - all within close range of the hotel.  We stayed for 3 nights and it was well worth it.  We were welcomed by staff and the Front Manager, Marc with a drink and  cool hand towels.  We met by the Manager and Chef who made some amazing curries.  The rooms were spacious, clean and the bathrooms were set in a natural environment with a tree or trees built within windows for your viewing whilst you shower.  We welcomed our friendly visitors such as a beetle and frogs as we knew we were in jungle region and were fully expecting and hoping to experience this.  Some reviews I have read were quite upset by these friendly visitors but I think if you are heading into this kind of countryside you should expect these things.  The waiting staff were so helpful and friendly and full of smiles especially at breakfast.  We were sad to leave this hotel and it was one of our favourites on our 15 day tour.
title: A Beautiful Stay - Thank you Sigirya Staff.

text: Sigiriya was the first stop of our honeymoon. We were warmly welcomed by the staff with a refreshing drink and towel. We were quickly driven by golf cart to our room and shown the amenities. Our room was extremely clean and had a lovely balcony area. The pool area was beautiful and the sunbeds were extremely comfortable. We especially enjoyed watching the monkeys around the pool. There was a great variety of food. We especially enjoyed the freshly made waffles and omelettes in the mornings. There was a good mix of international and local foods on offer in the evenings. We had a great feeling about the staff as they were very happy and welcoming. Dimasha was particularly friendly and helpful and always had our table reserved and waiting for us at every meal. We have brilliant memories of our stay at Sigiriya Jungles.
title: A wonderful honeymoon stay

text: Warm welcome with a flower, Awesome. Had to changed the room but front manager was very keen on our requirement & gave the best. Nice pool (One of the best). Nice bridge but only can see the Pidurangal rock, attention will give a chance to see the Sigiriya rock too. Foods were very tasty & lot of varieties. Overall its a nice stay for us. And have to mention that when we were checking out staff were there to say bye, and it was very very heart touching experience. Thanks to the management. We highly recommended & visit again.
title: Heart Touching Experience

ownerResponse:
{'id': '966120052', 'text': 'Dear Mrs. Aluthgama,

We are surprised at the comments made by you. Our Resident Manager and Front Office Manager mentioned that they exchanged pleasantries with Mr. Aluthgama during your stay.

We offered him a family room which is two inter-connecting rooms. Mr. Aluthgama requested one room for all four of you. We were flexible and offered you a suite room for all four to stay in instead. As you may know suite rooms are meant for two persons and more spacious but we accommodated four persons (adults) as this was a cheaper option and the request was made by Mr. Aluthgama.

The Jacuzzi is in perfect order. If by any chance you had an issue, you could have contacted the front office. Front office informed that there wasn’t a call from you about the Jacuzzi.

You were there for 1 night and had 3 meals. Yes, we had a full house on this day. When you arrived for dinner around 8:00 p.m. most of the tables were full and you were requested to wait for 10 minutes and we quickly arranged a table for you. You did not have a problem for the other two meals (B’fast & lunch).

The chairs are a part of the architecture of the hotel and some of them have commented positively but sad it was not to your taste.

The buffets are re-filled regularly. I wonder if there was an issue when you went in, but I am sure they would have quickly reacted.

We are extremely sorry that the hotel was not to your taste. In the meantime if you check, we have received extremely good comments on TripAdvisor & Google for our services and facilities. However, its always a personal choice.

SigiriyaJungles is located on the old route to Sigiriya through Audangawa. If you continue to travel through air force and Kimbissa, it is only 15 minutes and maximum 20 minutes. I wonder if you have taken that route.

Thank you again for staying with us.
', 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-08-22', 'responder': None, 'connectionToSubject': None}
placeInfo: {'id': '10625745', 'name': 'Sigiriya Jungles', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 642, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.994323, 'longitude': 80.73615, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d10625745-Reviews-Sigiriya_Jungles-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.sigiriyajungles.com/', 'address': 'Audangawa Road, Sigiriya 21122 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Audangawa Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21122'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 17, 'count2': 15, 'count3': 45, 'count4': 157, 'count5': 408}}
roomTip: Check out other hotels!
text: Firstly out of the four of us one didn't receive the welcome refreshments. We were then led to our rooms which was the suite room for four. However, there was only one deluxe bed and the other two beds were where the sofa was supposed to be. So it was not comfortable at all and it was very crowded in the room. Not worth the price at all. The deluxe bed was however comfortable so I suggest you get two deluxe rooms and never a family suite. There was a jacuzzi that didn't work. So overall pretty useless. Moreover, moving to buffets. The chairs in the dinning area are way too heavy, you burn all your calories trying to lift your chair up every time. The buffet times are 7:30-9:30 so everyone comes around 8 making it very crowded. We were said to stay in the waiting area till a table is free. The food is not refilled until the customers pester the chefs and managers. Not so close to Sigiriya rock. During this vacation I stayed at a three different hotels and comparing them all made me realize it was foolishness to spend this amount for this so called hotel. Highly not recommended. Check out Aliya Resort and spa Sigiriya or Ekho Sigiriya which are much better options.
title: WORST STAY EVER!

text:
A beautiful hotel run by amazing people. 
We arrived after a very tiring day in the hot weather and felt welcomed from the start. A relaxing plunge in the pool will get your energy back up. The live music by traditional musicians really chills you out at night. 
Wonderful staff. Mr. Lakmal sorted out the accommodation with no hassle. We had an issue with the electricity at night, and the maintenance crew were there to sort it out within a few minutes. Chathuranga attended all our needs during the meals. 
I wish them all the best for the future!
title: A relaxing calming place

ownerResponse:
{'id': '963294939', 'text': 'Dear Ms. Tanna,

Firstly, thank you very much for staying with us at SigiriyaJungles. The hotel is built by a very famous architect and surrounded by nature with rooms spreading across 10 acres of land. 

When you arrived, you did not like the original room allocated to you which was a Deluxe Plus but on your request, after showing you few rooms you settled down in Room No. 5&6. Thereafter, you did not make any comments what-so-ever during your 3 days about housekeeping or otherwise at the hotel. If so, we would have gladly attended to.
On the day of checking-out, you have requested for a refund from Deluxe Plus to Deluxe for which we happily offered to waive off the extras that you consumed.

Yes, our staff is always helpful, attentive and would inspire to serve a guest in the best possible manner. This is all because they are happy and motivated.
As you can see from other TripAdvisor reviews, we are rated highly due to our high quality service and facilities provided.

However, thank you very much for staying with us. 
', 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-08-05', 'responder': None, 'connectionToSubject': None}
placeInfo: {'id': '10625745', 'name': 'Sigiriya Jungles', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 642, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.994323, 'longitude': 80.73615, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d10625745-Reviews-Sigiriya_Jungles-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.sigiriyajungles.com/', 'address': 'Audangawa Road, Sigiriya 21122 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Audangawa Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21122'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 17, 'count2': 15, 'count3': 45, 'count4': 157, 'count5': 408}}
text:
During our 3 night stay we found 5 frogs, 3 lizards and countless mosquitos and other insects in our room/bathroom.

The room was old and worn out e.g. the bed linen had burn marks, toilet roll holder falling of the wall etc -this needs serious renovation.

The bathroom was dirty and almost like being outside. They had thin grates used as a partition to the garden - let all sorts of wildlife through.

We viewed various other rooms which were equally as bad- this is not a luxury hotel and no more than a 2 star hotel.

The workers were helpful and attentive but there is little they can do about a hotel which is in such poor state.

Perfect for bug lovers!
title: Far from luxury - like sleeping in the jungle

text:
Our recent stay at Sigiriya Jungle Hotel was incredible. The reservation staff was prompt, and from our arrival, the front office manager, the resident manager, the executive chef, and the F&B manager made our stay memorable. All the staff were attentive and friendly, going above and beyond with gestures like making towel animals, offering pastries and coffee before our hike, and arranging a birthday party with a solo musician.
Special thanks to Tyrone and Sanjana for their exceptional care. 
The hotel is well-maintained with high service standards and a good buffet spread. However, improving fresh juices by not adding water could enhance the quality. The best Club Sandwiches were on the À la carte menu, and the pastry chefs excelled with traditional bakery items.
We are grateful to Tyrone, the management team, and staff for creating memorable experience for all 18 of us. A unique gesture was the entire front office crew waving us off as we departed. We look forward to returning on our next visit to Sri Lanka.
title: Recent stay

roomTip: The AC in some rooms was very noisey. The rooms also have ceiling fans, but no screens, so you cannot keep the balcony doors open at night.
text: Stayed here for three nights on a tour to Sri Lanka. The hotel is a series of smaller buildings with rooms on two floors overlooking the pool and grounds. The rooms are comfortable (with AC and WiFi) and the bathrooms open to a private light well with trees. The pool was nice and the onsite restaurant served buffet or a-la-carte meals depending on the level of occupancy. Overall the hotel is looking a little tired and a few repairs are needed to bring it up to standard, but I still enjoyed my stay here.
title: Lodge hotel close to Sigiriya Rock

text: On my recent business trip I stayed at Sigiriya Jungles on my way south.  I found the staff to be excellent.  I enjoyed having European food options as a break from curry for breakfast.  My room was good and the air conditioning worked very well, even in 38 deg C heat with 100% humidity.  I really struggled with the heat, so having a sunctuary at night was very welcome.  The Sigiriya Jungles hotel was the best place I stayed during two weeks of travelling.  I recommend it.
title: Well trained staff, European food options and the air conditioning worked well.

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text: We stayed in Sri Lanka for the entire month of October, and with just this one exception, the hotels were universally great.  However, at the Camellia we encountered: bugs in the room; no room safe; no mini bar; no working television; and ludicrous alcohol prices in the bar.  And raising these issues with the front desk did no good, because nothing got fixed during the 3 nights we stayed there.  Yes, I know, these are "1st world problems" but the contrast with our other hotels was so striking that I can only conclude that these problems are unique to this hotel.
title: Avoid this hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
roomTip: Need more tea bags and coffee in room
text: Great hotel for a stop over, should put more than 2 tea bags in room and coffee a bit stingy. Great pool just watch price of beers as was told 900 rupee but changed to 1800 so just beware rooms comfy restaurant fine, staff very helpful nice place to relax, breakfast good. Local restaurants a bit to far, so hard to have a choice,
title: camellia

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text: We were on a trip touring Sri Lanka and this was our second hotel, basing ourselves there to be near the Rock and other tourist attractions. On arrival Lovely staff member showed us to our room, pointing out the relevant things,  tea and coffee making area, but there was no kettle or coffee sachets. Mosquito repellent plug in, was empty? The young staff member said he'd be back with a kettle and coffee so I asked him if he could also bring ice. He came back with only the kettle and said we would need to call reception for coffee and ice, which we did and told they do not give out coffee sachets?  Anyway when my husband and I went for  dinner we took some of the coffee sachets from the beveridge area back to the room. There are no bars or restaurants outside the hotel, it is very isolated so need to eat in the hotel which was very reasonably priced but not a great menu. The dining staff try very hard to get you to have the buffet at night, and I can understand why, but I am not a lover of buffet dining and just wanted something off the al la carte which is very basic. Food was ok. Staff in the main were very friendly but so many young trainees who cannot all speak English. We felt there was lack of management in the dining room but especially at the front desk when we went twice to say that water bottles had not been left in our room and then back again next day as could not get into room as key was bent? It was manned by young trainees who I felt just did not have a clue. Also the lighting en route to our lodge was not on and I stepped off the slabbed pathway into a large puddle as could not see. Hurt my ankle and new white trainers filthy with mud with the brown earth. Large bedroom and shower and all was clean.  The resort is nice enough but feel they really need to up the service and have more structure. For the 3 days we were there, the hand gel still had not been refilled in the ladies toilet at reception. Small things that should not be overlooked. I am sorry to be leaving this review with some negatives and it was the least favourite for us, out of the 6 hotels we had stayed in over our trip.
title: Bit disappointed

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text: Very nice place and nice staff kemil was especially nice. Very nice food and rooms. Pool was also nice I would come back again for next time in sri Lanka. Elephant Safari and Hiking was highlight of stay and would highly recommend to those staying.
title: Enjoyable stay

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}

title: Luxurious accommodation in garden setting

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text: All the staff were so nice, very helpful, it was our wedding anniversary and they went above and beyond to make it great! Great rooms and pool surrounded by nature! Chahdima you are so cute and very nice and provide exceptional service I wish I could take u home!
title: Great experience

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text: All the staff at the Resort were most helpful and courteous. Suwen in the Bar, looked after me very well..along with all his trainees.. Enjoyed our short stay at this Resort, the giant king size bed & firm pillows, along with spacious bathroom & feature shower wall were memorable
title: Short Stay with Trip A Deal

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text:
Great stop, relaxing and clean,
Hospitality fantastic 
Loved the pool
Wonderful restaurant with variety
Spacious rooms 
Enjoyed the spa massage but needs to improve privacy and cleanliness, change of towels etc
Loved the safari from here
title: Relaxing Oasis

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text: The service was very friendly and the staff are helpful. The restaurant food and drinks were also great, and offered a variety including local cuisine like hoppers. The pool was also very nice. The rooms are nice and there is lots of nature around.
title: Good relaxing vibes

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text:
What a beautiful relaxing place to stay. Food and service was exceptional....the buffet was so good, as was the burgers....our thanks to Tharinda in particular for looking after us.
The grounds are immaculate! and the pool was a great place to cool off.
title: Relaxing and comfortable

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text:
Fantastic hotel, fabulous staff. 
Nothing was too much trouble. Lovely spacious rooms (with ‘outside’ shower). Terrific food and great service. Fabulous pool with timber chaise lounges with mattress. Spacious and lush gardens. Everything was A1.
title: The BEST!

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text:
I spent there couple of days and I would highly recommend this resort to anyone looking for a nice, cozy, place with well organized personnel. 

Rooms are comfortable, exceptionally clean. When it comes to this subject it is one of the cleanest places I was staying at, here in Sri Lanka.
The location is perfect, the places of interest are pretty close, like Siyirya rock for example so you can enjoy even a sunrise overthere. 
Wonderful stuff, always with a big smile willing to provide a good service. Great experience!
title: Great experience!

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text: Clean and comfortable with very friendly staff. Good pool area. Restaurant served a balance or Sri Lankan and Western meals in a buffet style. Well located in the ‘cultural triangle’. Staff even surprised us with a cake for my husband’s birthday!
title: Good hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text: Excellent food, accommodation and venue. Lovely staff. Beautiful gardens. Swimming pool and very quiet.  Buffet each night was always delicious. Large airy rooms with fan and a/c.  I only ever used the fan. Monkeys and giant squirrels. Safari nearby
title: Great place to relax

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text: Everything was beautiful, especially the dinner with cooking in live, noodles, rice and the breakfast! Special mention to our waiter Tharindu, who served us very well, súper friendly and make feel us comfortable! We will back in the future.
title: Service and food

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text: What a gorgeous place to stay and relax. Beautiful resort. Lovely pool area and great room size. The staff are the friendliest and the boys at the outdoor bar are the best!!! The wide menu and buffet options are incredible for breakfast and dinner. But you absolutely must spend an afternoon post pool time at the outdoor bar with Viraj and Sudash for THE BEST Pina coladas in Sri Lanka 🍹 ❤️ Thanks for a great stay. We will be back 😊 🇱🇰
title: 🍹 🍹 with Viraj and Sudash at the Camellia

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text: Great resort. Beautiful pool. Delicious food. Friendly, hospitable wait staff. The shower in the room was beautiful! So big and the no ceiling was amazing. The wifi needs a bit of work but if you want to detach and just be in the resort it’s great. Town a distance away so great for staying in.
title: Great resort

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text: Staff are the best thing here. So delightful, caring and helpful and they make a mean cocktail. Special mention to the duty manager Kemil who went above and beyond for all guests.   The pool is also  amazing and was absolutely spotless. Unfortunately tho  the food was a real let down for us.
title: Tour

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text:
Really nice resort with lovely friendly staff who could not be more accommodating. 
The dining facilities are great and the bloke in charge ( Sureke ) of the dining room was lovely explaining everything to us. 
The pool was not too hot. 
There was various wildlife wandering around the grounds was great to see.
title: Jungle Retreat

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text: Lovely staff, gentle and welcoming. Large fresh room with TV and air con. Great buffet food, including delicious traditional Sri Lankan spiced curries, vegetarian options included and atmospheric dining area, refreshing outdoor pool. Useful 'safe' service at Reception to keep passports etc secure.
title: Great base hotel, a drive from Sigirya Rock visit.

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text: The service at this hotel was amazing, they kindly made us breakfast boxes to take on our early climb up Sigirya. I thoroughly enjoyed having a massage in the hotels spa after climbing. Rooms were comfortable and food was pleasant. A nice refreshing dip in pool is needed after a long day. Would love to stay again
title: Comfortable hotel close to Sigirya

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text: Very relaxed & beautiful. Staff, especially Chandima, were extremely helpful & pleasant. A great resort to stay as it's central to many wonderful sights including UNESCO world heritage Lion's Rock. Thank you Chandima for making our stay @ Camelia resort so special!
title: Wonderful!!

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text:
We stayed here for 2 nights and had a wonderful time. The rooms, amenities and staff are all great! 
But especially Dayanath and his team in the restaurant. They went above and beyond to cater to my needs and I always left with a full belly. 
Nothing was a problem for them and I’m really thankful  to them for being so helpful. 
The resort is a great location for sigiariya rock and the national park with the elephants. 
We’ve really enjoyed our stay here.
title: Friendly staff and great location

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
roomTip: Get a room with good internet connection.
text: Great grounds, beautiful swimming pool , spacious rooms and superb restaurant. Very friendly staff, especially Naduni at the reception area.Also ,close to Minneriya National Park.Also,close to Sigiriya Rock Fortress also known as the Lion Rock.
title: Sri Lanka experience

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text:
A friend told us about this hotel. He said ‘it’s in the middle of the Forrest, beautiful houses en accommodations and a well stay’ and it definitely is! 

We stayed here only one night (half board) and had a delicious dinner. The owner is very kind and the staff checked in on us. 

There is a nice big pool, food is great en there are cocktails, good coffee and it’s all well arranged. 

The room is big, has chairs, a wardrobe, a really big bathroom a comfortable beds. 

We’ll advise this stay to everyone!
title: Beautiful, wel organised stay! Finally some rest and me time!

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
roomTip: Everything was great!
text: Camellia was truly fantastic! It starts with the warm welcome in peaceful surroundings and serene tranquillity. A place to unwind and cool off by the pool. When you return to your room, a luxurious room awaits you with a hot shower and all your belongings are brought to the room. In addition, the food is delicious and there is plenty of choice from traditional to western food freshly prepared. Finally, a very friendly owner who goes out of his way to give guests a special stay. In short, highly recommended to unwind in a beautiful location!
title: Beautiful place very good staff and facilities to unwind!

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text:
This hôtel is in lush nature. 
Calm is king here, and we can observe some small animals.  
The meals are good and varied. 
The rooms are cozy. 
The staff is very nice, special mention for Chandima. 
Thank you for three days off. 
We are sad to leave this fabulous place.

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
roomTip: Everything takes a little longer than usual but that is part of experiencing another country. Just relax and go with the flow.
text:
The staff and pool were fabulous. The grounds were spacious and relaxing.

The food was very good although the local cuisine was better than European cuisine.

A few very minor grumbles: our room was quite dark and the bathroom ceiling needed maintenance but these did not detract from our stay. Otherwise everything was comfortable, the aircon and fan worked well.

The pool was superb way to refresh and relax after a trek up Sigiriya. The staff were helpful,  friendly and polite particularly in the restaurant and bar.
title: Great setting, pool and staff

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
text:
Clean and comfortable rooms. The pool was great.

The food was amazing. 

We payed extra for massage and spa. It was ok, could have been better.

The service here is extraordinary.

Best hotel we have been to in Sri Lanka

text:
The Camellia Resort is a great place to spend some time if you are visiting Sri Lanka. It has good accommodation, which is set in the woods in individual cottages which provide an upstairs and downstairs option. The pool is great and is very large, I didn’t use any other spa facilities so can’t really comment on those. 
The occupancy was low during our visit, however the service was of a high standard. We were looked after by a number of staff, however Vijay stands out as being genuinely interested in the experience we were having at the hotel and in Sri Lanka.
Highly recommended
title: Excellent Accommodation and Spa

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
roomTip: The hotel caters for large tours which detracts from the calm and intimacy at dinner, bar, pool. Don’t bother to dress for dinner!
text:
There is so much to like at the camellia spa, a few small tweaks and some TLC would take good to great 😊 
The grounds and pool area are very pretty and well maintained with trees and shrubs creating secluded paths and shade. 
The pool is clean and well tended, there are pool towels and cushions for the loungers. It gets very busy late afternoon but is barely used in the day.
The rooms are large with a fridge and air con, kettle everything works well but very limited drinks selection no herbal teas etc Beds and pillows comfortable, you will need to ask for blankets of you need them.
The restaurant area is a little dull and uninspiring, as is the bar although they do a good selection of well priced cocktails. It can also be hard to get a seat and the seating is not especially comfortable or set up for intimate talking. 
The restaurant food is ok, they have varied well priced buffet in the evening for 16 dollars but beware it can get busy so it feels like a canteen rather than a relaxing evening meal. Breakfast also ok, breads, fruit cake, egg chef and of course curries.
All staff are polite and welcoming, helping to arrange trips etc
Return trip by tuk tuk to Sigiriya 4,500 +entrance
Return trip by tuk tuk to dambulla and fruit market 4,500 + entrance
Elephant safari 5,000
Overall this was a great base to experience the cultural triangle but if you are looking for more from a hotel it may not be for you. There is absolutely nothing in walking distance of the hotel so you are tied to it for food/ drink even water. Having said this, prices are not unreasonable and you will likely be tired from the trips and heat and only too happy to eat from the buffet and flop into a nice comfy bed
title: Pretty and peaceful base for exploring cultural trangle

placeInfo: {'id': '3691242', 'name': 'Camellia Resort And Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1069, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.995308, 'longitude': 80.73703, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d3691242-Reviews-Camellia_Resort_And_Spa-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.camelliaresortspa.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 79, 'count4': 363, 'count5': 604}}
roomTip: Choose  lower level rooms if you have elderly travellers and rooms closer to the Dining Area as the path to the rooms is dimly lit at night
text:
We stayed for 2 Nights at Camelia Resort & Spa in Feb 2024. This Resort is between Dambulla & Habarana. The resort is off the main road to Habarana, the last stretch of resort around 800 meters is not paved. 

The resort is well maintained with good landscaping. The rooms are spread across in blocks with each block housing rooms in lower level & upper level. Each room has its own balcony with seating. The room is quite spacious with working table, moderately sized bathroom, decent Aircon. The lighting in the room is little dull however the windows throws good amount of natural light if you keep the window blinds open.  The resort has a good swimming pool  and also a Spa to pamper the guests. 

Their in house restaurant is next to the swimming pool with sufficient seating. The breakfast buffet is elaborate with Choice of Srilankan &  Continental. Few items in the breakfast may feel repetitive if you are staying longer. Lunch & Dinner options tend to be Al Carte or Buffet depending on the occupancy at the resort. For Vegetarians the food options for Lunch or Dinner are limited but managable. 

The staff at the resort are accommodative and helpful with any request.

Being surrounded by nature, you might have insects get in to your room if you keep the room door open. This is avoidable if caution is taken by keeping the room door & windows closed .

The resort can be an ideal base to explore sites like Sigiriya , Dambulla & Polonnaruwa or visits to the National parks such as the Minneriya national park/ Kaudulla national park.

Overall a resort to be considered for a relaxing and peaceful stay amidst nature while in Sigiriya or around.
title: Relaxing Stay Amidst Nature

text: Best bar man we have encountered so far in Sri Lanka. Pasindu made my partner a Mojito which was fabulous whilst chatting to us with intelligent conversation and a smile. placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text:
Beautiful location with great service, lovey swimming pools, close the main safari. Lalantha went above and beyond to make my stay enjoyable.

Wide open fields with lots of birds, peacocks wondering the grounds of the hotel. 

Would recommend staying here for a peaceful holiday.
title: Beautiful location and great service.

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
roomTip: If you're looking for somewhere secluded and quiet, this is the place for you. I wouldn't stay here if you want to be close to a town.
text:
Kassapa is a beautiful hotel situated in the most gorgeous eco-friendly surroundings. 

The service is second to none. We were looked after by Lalandha, who was friendly, smiling all the time and really helpful. He ensured we could sit where we liked for our meals, we had great food and of course ensured the drinks kept flowing. 

I have to make special mention of the fact that he remembered all of our personal preferences, e.g. no ice in drinks, etc.

Thank you so much Lalandha.

Furthermore, all drinks were much cheaper than other hotels we've stayed at during our trip, but they definitely didn't skimp on measures.

The rooms are spacious with great amenities, including hot showers with perfect water pressure, fans and AC. 

The WiFi has good coverage if you want it! Better than that, the wildlife is gorgeous. We just had a peacock join us for toast this morning and we've seen some beautiful birds.

The pool was warm, and large.

I'd definitely recommend staying here!!!
title: Great service, beautiful views, comfortable rooms

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
roomTip: Quiet and a very peaceful place.
text:
I wanted to extend my heartfelt thanks to you for organizing my stay at Kassapa Lions Rock. 

As always, the staff at Kassapa went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable. Their friendliness and willingness to assist were truly appreciated. We were also delighted with the food—it was fantastic! What stood out even more was seeing the impressive renovations taking place at the hotel. The improvements since our last visit in December are remarkable, and it's evident how much care and attention have gone into enhancing the guest experience.

Our recent stay was genuinely enjoyable, and we left feeling refreshed and content. Despite the intense heat and the lack of rain, the team managed to keep everything perfectly neat and organized, which speaks volumes about their dedication.

Please extend our sincere gratitude to every member of the Kassapa Lions Rock team. They made our stay memorable, and we are already looking forward to our next visit!

Thimothy Joseph
Managing Director
I-Net Systems and Solutions (Pvt) Ltd
title: Our recent stay was genuinely enjoyable @ Kassapa Lions Rock

roomTip: There were 2 pools in this hotel which was widely used by the guests in the hot & humid conditions.
text: We had a great experience at Kassapa Lions Rock, Sigiriya, Sri Lanka. Bookings were done through HOT (House of Travel) Colombo. Very managed hotel with spacious villa type rooms on an acreage piece of land. Staff were very welcoming & always happy to help. Fondly remember Michael at the reception always smiling. Room was very clean. Breakfast & dinner (half board plan) was delicious with a wonderful array to chose from. Great memories at this hotel located quite close to the Sigiriya Rock Fortress which we were happy to climb. We certainly recommend this hotel.
title: Very happy experience at Kassapa Lions Rock Sigiriya, Sri Lanka
