text: Lalandha and his colleagues were welcoming throughout. Great base to explore the sights in the local area. Rooms are fine, not luxury but perfectly reasonable for price range. Both pools are nice. We stayed three nights which was plenty to do everything we wanted.
title: Great visit

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
roomTip: The a la carte menu also very good 👍
text: Fantastic hotel, we stayed for 4 nights as a family. The pools are excellent, as well as the food, breakfast & dinner buffets are really fab with lots of variety. The hotel is set in a natural environment with lots of wildlife. Good location for visiting the Sygirya rock fortress, Minneriya Park & we did a local village tour as well as a visit to the Athreya Ayurvedic Spa. We were sad to leave - thank you!
title: Beautiful hotel in natural location

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text: Wonderful stay in an excellent hotel, friendly and serving staff, the food was amazing with wide range of choice. There are 2 swimming pools where one has the view to Sigirya Rock. Great for you if you love being in great space of nature with comfort. The rooms are huge with nice shower and bath. The AC and fan in the room are perfect. Reserve several nights there, we spent 3 wonderful days there.
title: Wonderful hotel near Sigiriya with spacious rooms, 2 swimming pool

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text:
The hotel is a mid-range hotel with a good location for visiting the sights in Sigiriya.
The rooms are specious but a bit dark. Price/value is good.
The restaurant is so-so, I’d rate the food a 3 star experience. The breakfast (included in room rate) is particularly disappointing with only instant coffee and no cereals.
title: Good location

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text: Well situated hotel near the top attractions, clean rooms, nice surroundings with a welcome swimming pool after a long and warm day. Staff is friendly, special thanks to Lalantha! Dinner comes with live music, too loud, made us leave the place early and get back to the room
title: Good hotel well situated

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text:
We stayed here 3 nights whilst doing a tour around Sri Lanka. It is so tranquil you feel like you’ve entered a spa retreat. 
Lovely rooms in your own separate building. Shower open to the sky.  Excellent air con. 
The male staff in the restaurant were so friendly, happy with big smiles and would do anything for you. 
Wonderful place to base yourself whilst seeing ancient cities in the area.
title: Tranquil paradise

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
roomTip: Opt for a ground floor room to avoid noise. Try eating out at some of the restaurants in Sigirya
text: Generally a very good three star hotel…good value for money. Pool area was nice with a good view of Lions Rock and a very relaxing atmosphere around the entire hotel and grounds. Restaurant was average…the evening buffet is pushed heavily by the waiting staff and not particularly great value but that depends how much you can eat! All staff very friendly and helpful. One major downside to some rooms is the noise of rattling windows and trees bashing against the roof, created by the constant winds in the area. Apart from that, a very nice hotel for a few days to explore all the local area has to offer.
title: Relaxing, good value hotel but with some pitfalls that could easily be addressed

text: Had a really nice stay, clean rooms and the people were very friendly to us. Everything was possible and they were helpful. Furthermore, the breakfast was delicious with a lot of options for everybody. And the view on the lion’s rock was stunning!
title: Had a great stay!

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text: Amazing trip, Wonderful people. Very quiet and nice place to relax. Staf is very nice and hard working!  Good breakfast and very nice bathroom and rooms in general. Two pools close to the cabins. A lot of nature sounds! Breakfast has a lot of choice and the location is good!
title: Amazing

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text: The Stay was great. Unique stay. Breakfast and service was really nice. Houses where really pretty with a pretty bathroom. Beds slept well. People where very friendly kind helpful. Good cocktails. Great view on the lions rock. Great nature surroundings
title: Nature stay

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text:
Nice holidays at Kassapa Lions Rock with my family. People are nice and especially our waiter Lalantha !!
Swimming pool is nice and the environment is very calm which is appreciated. 
Nice for family holidays. 
However, cleaning of the room needs to be improved.
title: Good hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text:
Amazing place to stay. We stayed 2 nights and it was very pleasent and clean property.

My kids enjoyed the swimming pool and thw choice of food menu.. food to be much appreciated.. especiallu mr.lalanth in canteen was amazing ..

Must try accomodation.
title: Blended with Nature, a real star hotel with good and quality choice food menu.

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text:
Such a great, tranquil place to stay. Felt like a retreat, lovely gardens, pool and staff. Lalantha was especially kind and helpful. Abundant bird life and resident monitor lizard.
Accommodation was comfortable and private. Great place to stay if you want to visit Sigriya.
title: Family holiday

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text: This was our third stay at Kassapa Lions Rock and it did not disappoint.   The staff, including the Manager Michael, went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable and organised a great elephant safari.  The food is absolutely sensational and the chefs and restaurant staff are fantastic,  it also has a great pool and a smaller kids pool.  Beautiful, spacious room and surrounding landscape with a view of Sigiriya rock.
title: Wonderful hotel, food and staff

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text: I went with my friends for a a small trip .the hotel was amazing the room is so nice the staff were friendly and welcoming waiters in the restaurant and the house keeping boys… ,the chef made the best  and delicious dishes ,the lady in the reception (Ishara) was so kind always smiling thank you for Your hospitality.we will come again for sure ❤️❤️❤️❤️
title: Amazing stay

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text: Very nice place to stay. It was very calm and soothing. The pool is nice and the restaurant was good. Friendly staff. The peper steak and pasta carbonara were good to eat for diner by the candlelight. The breakfast was various and live cooking eggs.
title: Nice and calm place to stay

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text: Lively little resort, good variety of food, great pool and friendly staff. We stayed here on an Intrepid Tour. It is handy to the Lions Paw rock. It consists of individual bungalows surrounded by gardens with an open air restaurant and two pools.
title: A gem in the centre of Sri Lanka

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text:
Great location 
2 pools
Serene and peaceful
Exceptionally clean 

Went as part of a group tour ( 14 of us in total). Stayed here as it is close to the lions rock so we hiked there in the morning.

Beds was great, fully functioning AC and fan.
Water bottles and fridge in room too which was a bonus
title: Great

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text: This was easily one of the best stays. The food was amazing. The service was top notch, special thanks to staff Lalantha, Piumika and everyone else who worked to give us an unforgettable experience. The location was convenient for us since we travelled to Sigiriya, Pidurangala and Dambulla. Definitely recommend the place.
title: Wonderful stay with a view of Sigiriya

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text: Excellent place to stay - a pearl in the middle of the jungle. The hotell roms are big with very comfortable beds. The bathroom is also fascinating with open sky over the shower. The service was excellent much thanks to our waiter, Lalantha. Much recommended!
title: The hidden gem in the jungle

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text: Beautiful hotel in middle of lush green jungle . Peaceful with bird and wildlife sounds . Pool great clean and welcoming. Rooms very large comfortable beds and light sheets . Food amazing and staff could not be more helpful and genuine. Stayed 2 nights while traveling could have stayed for a week or 2 will come back .
title: Great hotel and location

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text:
To begin with the best point, the food who is delicious and varied.

But the bedrooms are not very good, little  plug and the sheets are not very good. The bathroom as a lot of leafs and it is difficult to wash in it because of the low pression. It is hard to get the WiFi password and there is no information in the room to know how to contact the staff.
title: Sri Lanka may 2024

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text:
Lovely hotel setting with a backdrop of the majestic Sigiriya rock.
We stayed for 3 nights on our Sri Lanka tour and was one of the families favourite.
2 pools, stunning views,, great food and lovely friendly staff.
Only giving 4 as I think the chalets could do with some TLC, but a minor critique as for 3 nights it was more than acceptable.
Special mention to Harsha the Bar Supervisor who was so friendly and welcoming during our stay. Top man!
title: 'Rock' Solid Hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text: It was a nice stay in a nice environment with lots of beautiful small animals in the premisis like squirrels and birds. Rooms were good and clean, but not perfectly maintained. Friendly personel. Special thanks to Lalanthe, the waiter, he made sure we got everything we needed.
title: Nice quiet stay

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text:
We had an outstanding experience at this serene and beautiful location. The staff welcoming and delightful. Lalantha was always helpful during breakfast and dinner service. The Sri Lankan food on offer was plentiful and delicious and the staff were always very willing to help us. 
Thank you for a delightful stay.
title: Delightfully peaceful

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text: The hotel is set amid beautiful grounds with peacocks on site. Each room is an individual 'cabin' and umbrellas are available in all the rooms should it rain while getting to breakfast/supper. There are two pools and ample seating around the pool, with shaded areas. Food was good.
title: Fantastic place to stay close to Sigiriya and elephant safari.

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text: Central location to visit all historic, cultural and wild life parks within the cultural triangle. Incredible service with friendly staff. Always trying to please guests to their specific needs. Rooms are clean, spacious and equipped with all amenities to make your stay comfortable. Give this place a shot. They will surprise you with their service and you will be surprised with the value you get.
title: 3 days in the cultural triangle

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text: Had the most amazing stay at this hotel...the bungalows are basic but set in beautiful tropic forest, lots of wildlife to see and a perfect base for local site seeing. The staff were friends and made our stay easy...lalantha was a star, each night in the restaurant he remembered our daily  activities and talked to us about them...would love to return
title: Amazing Stay

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text: Lovely hotel in great location for exploring this area. We stayed half board and the food was really good at breakfast and dinner. We used the pool a couple of days out of the 3 we stayed, ot was clean and the water was warm. The staff are so friendly and helpful.  We were looked after brilliantly by the staff and in particularly Lalantha who was fantastic
title: Great hotel, lovely people and good location

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text:
My family and I came to stay here for two nights, and we were wonderfully pleased not only with the amenities, but also the gracious and helpful staff.

The rooms are spectacular, with a massive private open air shower, bathtub, very comfortable beds, and wonderfully efficient AC. The grounds are extremely well maintained, with two amazing pools and tons of local wildlife (peacocks and small monitor lizards) roaming the grounds.

The food was delicious, with either a fixed menu, a la carte, or buffet depending on the option you took when booking, and the wait staff attentive and helpful, although it did get complicated on one instance for separating items charged to rooms.

All in all, I would highly recommend this hotel for guests looking for some tranquility and relaxation before or after climbing Sigiriya.
title: How wonderful

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text: Extent hotel, bungalows are set in tropical gardens which have great pillows, beds and new AC. Bathrooms are basic but very clean.  Lovely large pool and outstanding buffet breakfast and dinner which was different every day. Very friendly and helpful staff. There are peacocks and beautiful bird life throughout the gardens. I highly recommend this hotel.
title: Excellent Comfortable Hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
roomTip: Very interesting nature there. A peacock wondered round while we were there and a lots of other birds. Also an iguana strolling around!
text: We spent three days here. Really good base to explore the Cultural Triangle and only a few mins from Sigiriya Rock. Lodges were lovely, breakfast and dinner buffets were excellent and a very nice pool to relax after a trip to the sights. Strongly recommend staying here.
title: Excellent place to explore the Cultural Triangle from

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text: Great place to stay. The room was clean and well air conditioned.  The shower was great with plenty of hot water.  The open air restaurant was really nice and the food delicious and plentiful.  The restaurant/bar staff were so friendly and memorable (especially Lalandha and Ashen). Wish we could have stayed longer.
title: Great stay at Kassapa Lions Rock

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
roomTip: Ask for rooms closer to the restaurant if you have trouble walking
text:
It is a large property with both cabanas and also a block with rooms. We were a large group of around 30 pax and we were given the block on the far end. So we got rooms near by but it was a bit of a walk to the restaurant. Meals were decent. But the food did not have name tags and when inquired about the food items the staff lacked knowledge. This proved to be bit of a challenged as we had both vegetarians and also those with food allergies. The rooms were large but we felt that the rooms were not used often as it had a mold sort of smell. It would have been better had the rooms been opened up prior to giving them to guests. Non of the rooms had hand/ face towels but upon request we were provided with those as well as tea cups. The staff is quite friendly and were willing to help. We got the feeling that the hotel is understaffed and lacks trained personnel. We were arranged a separate area in the Kamatha area for a sing-along and the hotel was able to arrange a Calypso band upon our request. Overall we enjoyed out stay though there were few hiccups along the way. Nothing to complain about the stay. 
TIP - if you have trouble walking, request for a room closer to the restaurant otherwise its quite a walk!
title: Large Spacious Property!

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text:
Good hotel with the rooms more like bungalows than hotel rooms. Two pools available although we only used these in the evening (when dark). Food was reasonable rather than great, but the staff could not be faulted in their desire to please.

Very close to Sigirya rock which can be seen from the front of the hotel and therfore within easy travelling distance
title: Good for visiting Sigiriya Rock

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
text:
Great hotel with lovely people and nature all around you. You see the monkeys running on the roofs and hear the birds chirping in the morning.

The breakfast buffet is nice. The service is good. They bring you suitcase to the hotel room and you get cold wet towels and a drink when you check in.
title: Great hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '1011470', 'name': 'Kassapa Lions Rock', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1658, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.979502, 'longitude': 80.72743, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d1011470-Reviews-Kassapa_Lions_Rock-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.kassapalionsrock.com/', 'address': 'Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 34, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 710, 'count5': 712}}
roomTip: Ideal for travellers to get good food and enjoy a chilling comfortable stay ,
text: We stayed here for 2 nights whilst on a tour , I have no complaints about this lovely little resort, all the staff were great especially the boys behind the bar, nothing was too much trouble and all staff went out of their way to accommodate us, the breakfast and evening meal was excellent , a good choice of English and continental/Sri Lanka breakfast and a good choice for evening meal , the rooms were clean and very comfortable with everything you need , I would definitely stay here again ,
title: Highly recommend

placeInfo: {'id': '10150231', 'name': 'The Otunna Guest House', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 193, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.946132, 'longitude': 80.76045, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d10150231-Reviews-The_Otunna_Guest_House-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': None, 'address': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 2, 'count5': 190}}
text: Host Dinesh was incredibly welcoming and helpful. He organised our tours and was always very accomodating. The chalet was perfect with comfortable beds and great facilities. The breakfast was a highlight, delicious traditional Sri Lanka food! Would highly recommend staying here!
title: Amazing breakfast

placeInfo: {'id': '10150231', 'name': 'The Otunna Guest House', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 193, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.946132, 'longitude': 80.76045, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d10150231-Reviews-The_Otunna_Guest_House-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': None, 'address': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 2, 'count5': 190}}
text: We couldn’t choose a better place to start our trip around Sri Lanka. We have been lucky to find an owner like Dinesh, who seems to be a long lost friend whom you hadn’t seen for a long time. The room are really comfortable, we have a fantastic dinner and we have been helped to organise our next day in the country. But what we’ll remember the most about this place are the people who we met: Dinesh and his family are there for you, with a smile, a passion fruit fresh pressed juice and some story about how much they care about their guests. As I said, a long lost friend in the jungle…
title: A long lost friend in the jungle, the best place where to start our trip in Sri Lanka

placeInfo: {'id': '10150231', 'name': 'The Otunna Guest House', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 193, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.946132, 'longitude': 80.76045, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d10150231-Reviews-The_Otunna_Guest_House-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': None, 'address': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 2, 'count5': 190}}
text: Dinesh was very friendly and welcoming. He is exceedingly helpful. The accommodation was very comfortable and there was plenty of space for our family of 4 (2 adults, 2 older teenagers). The property and the room are very well maintained. The fridge in the room was useful for keeping drinks chilled. Each day Dinesh provided a very tasty local breakfast with lots of different flavours and very generous portions. Otunna Guest House provides a great base for visiting Sigiriya and surrounding areas.  There is a good choice of restaurants nearby within a short walk to Sigiriya village or using a cheap tuk-tuk. Definitely recommend this accommodation.
title: Friendly & Comfortable Stay

placeInfo: {'id': '10150231', 'name': 'The Otunna Guest House', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 193, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.946132, 'longitude': 80.76045, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d10150231-Reviews-The_Otunna_Guest_House-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': None, 'address': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 2, 'count5': 190}}
text: Really really reccomend staying here. A beautiful garden with lovely, clean chalets with a stunning surrounding. The staff, in particular Dinesh, go above and beyond with lots of interesting conversation, delicious food (fresh herbs, fruit and veg from the garden) and drinks and staff are very helpful. One of the best places we’ve stayed!
title: Beautiful stay with very friendly and helpful staff

placeInfo: {'id': '10150231', 'name': 'The Otunna Guest House', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 193, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.946132, 'longitude': 80.76045, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d10150231-Reviews-The_Otunna_Guest_House-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': None, 'address': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 2, 'count5': 190}}
text: We had the new chalet (2 months old) for our family of 5. The chalet is built of high quality material. Great breakfast! The owner is very nice and helps organizing tours eg lions rock, safari in the national park, transfer to Kandy. Highly recommended!
title: Best stay close to Lion Rock

Everything is made with love and devotion.

placeInfo: {'id': '10150231', 'name': 'The Otunna Guest House', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 193, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.946132, 'longitude': 80.76045, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d10150231-Reviews-The_Otunna_Guest_House-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': None, 'address': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 2, 'count5': 190}}
roomTip: Spend some time speaking with both Dinesh and his father Jayawardana.
text: What can I say… Dinesh is the definition of a fantastic host. We were first greeted to a beautiful treed yard that can only be done by a person with attention to detail. He then presented us with passion fruit drinks that were the best I’ve ever had. Our newly built and furnished guest suite was very nicely featured with a big beautiful comfortable bed (king?). Dinesh’s father and mother complimented the glowing charm that you feel from the moment you enter their grounds. When it comes to the breakfast’s you better come prepared w a good appetite because the food is delicious and ample. As good as it was, there was no chance of finishing it all and I’m a big eater. Dinesh’s father, who grew up there delighted us with many stories and one memorable one of when Queen Elizabeth came to visit the Lions Paws rock and frescos climbing bamboo stairs to get to them. This place is top notch and I think will not disappoint those that love beauty, charm, nature and good people. Well done Dinesh and family, all the best to your success!
title: Rarest of Beauty in Nature and Hosts

placeInfo: {'id': '10150231', 'name': 'The Otunna Guest House', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 193, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.946132, 'longitude': 80.76045, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d10150231-Reviews-The_Otunna_Guest_House-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': None, 'address': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 2, 'count5': 190}}
text: Thank you Denish for the wonderful time with you. What a special place to live in the middle of the garden among countless plants, right next to Lions Rock. And at night you can even hear elephants. Plus incredibly delicious food and, above all, totally warm-hearted people. Denish and his parents have truly created a paradise there. We will hopefully be back one day...
title: Paradies next to Lions Rock

placeInfo: {'id': '10150231', 'name': 'The Otunna Guest House', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 193, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.946132, 'longitude': 80.76045, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d10150231-Reviews-The_Otunna_Guest_House-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': None, 'address': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 2, 'count5': 190}}
roomTip: If you want cold beer ask Dinesh to turn on the fridge before your arrival
text:
Otunna was simple and great. A cute wooden room with smooth concrete floor and great water pressure amidst a buzzy jungle inspired garden with chipmunks, squirrels and exotic song birds. Dinesh is a lovely host, who showed us around the garden and explains of the medicinal use of the plants as well as culinary uses of the spices and herbs. The dinner and breakfast was very generous, to the extent where we asked to get only half of his servings, even though it was delicious. There are a lot of mosquitos there (it is in the jungle..), which is why there's plenty of mosquito repellent in the garden. 
The only downside for me was the beers are kept in the mini bar in the room, which wasn't cold because we took the key out.
title: Wooden room in the middle of a magical jungle garden

placeInfo: {'id': '10150231', 'name': 'The Otunna Guest House', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 193, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.946132, 'longitude': 80.76045, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d10150231-Reviews-The_Otunna_Guest_House-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': None, 'address': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 2, 'count5': 190}}
text:
A fun little guesthouse with an amazing host (Dinesh) who ensures your happiness and comfort. 

Incredible breakfast made by Dinesh’s mother which includes fruits, roti, fresh juices, pancakes and other local treats. So good. 

The guesthouse is within walking distance to some lively bars and restaurants - but you can also take a tuk tuk if it’s rainy or dark. 

Would highly recommend Otunna if you go to Sigiriya!
title: Fun guesthouse with the friendliest host ever!

placeInfo: {'id': '10150231', 'name': 'The Otunna Guest House', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 193, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.946132, 'longitude': 80.76045, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d10150231-Reviews-The_Otunna_Guest_House-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': None, 'address': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'No 104/A Kalapuraya', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 2, 'count5': 190}}
text: My mum and I stayed for 2 nights and had the most wonderful time. Dinesh and his family look after you so incredibly well and go above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. They cooked us the most delicious Sri Lankan breakfast and dinner. The whole family were very friendly and made sure we enjoyed our stay in their lovely village. They really made it an unforgettable experience. Thank you!!
title: Wonderful stay in Sigiriya

placeInfo: {'id': '11979805', 'name': 'EKHO Sigiriya', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 220, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.95179, 'longitude': 80.75518, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d11979805-Reviews-EKHO_Sigiriya-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.facebook.com/ekhosigiriya/', 'address': 'Sigiriya Road, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Sigiriya Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 18, 'count4': 48, 'count5': 142}}
roomTip: Do not go - if there are any issues, there is no management to help and EKHO customer service is non-existent.
text:
TL;DR
- Management was unhelpful, absent and dismissive (though the rest of the staff were very nice) 
- I sent the below email to EKHO customer service and 2 weeks later, they haven't had the decency to reply
- To say this is a luxury hotel is nothing short of a joke - whilst I'm sure it was nice at one point, there has been no investment for many years 

On the first evening we had a big issue with lizards in our room. At about 7pm we saw one crawl across our bed and called two people to help remove them. After approximately 10 minutes of trying the lizards scurried under the bed and the employees said “call us back when you see them again”. My partner simply pulled out the torch on his phone and found them in less than 1 minute. 

We asked to change rooms as we could see that there were open/broken panels in the ceilings in both the bedroom and bathroom that lizards could easily crawl into, but were informed there were no spare rooms available. When we returned from dinner at 10:30pm we were told that they had managed to find a room - by which point, you’ll appreciate that it was very late and we weren’t going to move.

There was also no manager to speak to at any point during this incident.

This incident made the room very dusty and dirty - which triggered my partner’s asthma. However, our room was not cleaned once during our stay. Our towels weren’t changed, we had no spare toilet paper, and the bin had no bin liner which meant by the time we checked out the bin was overflowing.

This is supposed to be a 4* resort and it was instead worse than any homestay we have stayed in during our time in Sri Lanka - for which I would’ve paid a fraction of the price.

To top this off, when we checked out the small compensation I was offered (only after speaking with 3 members of staff), was a free lunch worth less than 5% of our total $170+ room bill. The manager was totally unhelpful, barely apologised and acted as though he was doing me a favour by not charging for this lunch. Our reports of the shortcomings in the accommodation and service were met with a shrug.
title: Do not book - terrible management and customer service from EKHO

placeInfo: {'id': '11979805', 'name': 'EKHO Sigiriya', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 220, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.95179, 'longitude': 80.75518, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d11979805-Reviews-EKHO_Sigiriya-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.facebook.com/ekhosigiriya/', 'address': 'Sigiriya Road, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Sigiriya Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 18, 'count4': 48, 'count5': 142}}
text: My family and I stayed overnight whilst site-seeing here and this place provided a great stay whilst still being close to great attractions like Sigiriya and Pidurangala. This is a great short-stay location with plenty of space to unwind near the pool. A huge thank you to the staff for the lovely service!
title: A great location and wonderful service!

placeInfo: {'id': '11979805', 'name': 'EKHO Sigiriya', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 220, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.95179, 'longitude': 80.75518, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d11979805-Reviews-EKHO_Sigiriya-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.facebook.com/ekhosigiriya/', 'address': 'Sigiriya Road, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Sigiriya Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 18, 'count4': 48, 'count5': 142}}
text: We loved our stay at EKHO Sigiriya. Classical Sri Lankan environment and excellent hospitality. Food was delicious and very courteous staff. Relaxing swimming pool to cool down after a sweaty climb of the Sigiriya rock! Would recommend to any family to stay.

placeInfo: {'id': '11979805', 'name': 'EKHO Sigiriya', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 220, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.95179, 'longitude': 80.75518, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d11979805-Reviews-EKHO_Sigiriya-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.facebook.com/ekhosigiriya/', 'address': 'Sigiriya Road, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Sigiriya Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 18, 'count4': 48, 'count5': 142}}
roomTip: The set menu food was excellent. The service was great.
text: The rooms were comfortable and cosy. The service was great. Shanaka was very prompt and efficient when serving us. Chef Rohan did an excellent job with the food. The buffet was small as this hotel is a small property but everthing was tasty. The set menu was excellent with a choice. The Sigiriya rock is a five minute walk from the hotel. There were plenty of small cafes and shops located right outside the hotel. Overall a most enjoyable stay. Will definitely recommend this property.
title: Weekend getaway.

placeInfo: {'id': '11979805', 'name': 'EKHO Sigiriya', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 220, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.95179, 'longitude': 80.75518, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d11979805-Reviews-EKHO_Sigiriya-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.facebook.com/ekhosigiriya/', 'address': 'Sigiriya Road, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Sigiriya Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 18, 'count4': 48, 'count5': 142}}
text:
Comfortable hotel close to the historical region of Sigiriya.

The rooms were modern and well equipped. The hotel had a good outdoor pool.

Breakfast was served on the terrace close to the pool. There was a plentiful and good choice of breakfast food served by a very attentive staff.

The hotel has a restaurant but is also within walking distance of a variety of shops and restaurants.

Good value for money.
title: Well located and comfortable in Sigiriya

placeInfo: {'id': '11979805', 'name': 'EKHO Sigiriya', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 220, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.95179, 'longitude': 80.75518, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d11979805-Reviews-EKHO_Sigiriya-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.facebook.com/ekhosigiriya/', 'address': 'Sigiriya Road, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Sigiriya Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 18, 'count4': 48, 'count5': 142}}
roomTip: Avoid eating here
text: We stayed at Ekho Sigiriya for 3 nights while we climbed Pidurangala and Sigiriya rock. The accommodation was fantastic and clean. The pool was great too. Food however was average. Which wasn’t an issue with the Little Hut restaurant just down the road offering one of the best feeds we had during our time in Sri Lanka.
title: Great stay but don’t bother with their food

placeInfo: {'id': '11979805', 'name': 'EKHO Sigiriya', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 220, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.95179, 'longitude': 80.75518, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d11979805-Reviews-EKHO_Sigiriya-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.facebook.com/ekhosigiriya/', 'address': 'Sigiriya Road, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Sigiriya Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 18, 'count4': 48, 'count5': 142}}
text: One of the best stays ever. The environment of the hotel was pleasant and welcoming. Both check-in and check-out were professionally handled  by Tharindu at the front office. General manager Susil was a wonderful guy and made sure our stay is comfortable. Shantha our server went above and beyond on serving our meals fresh as we desired. The rooms were very clean and unique and shout out to the great housekeeping staff Asitha and Sumeda at the EKHO Sigiriya.  We highly recommend this wonderful hotel for your family getaway. We will be visiting here again! Thank you
title: Love the charm of this Hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '11979805', 'name': 'EKHO Sigiriya', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 220, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.95179, 'longitude': 80.75518, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d11979805-Reviews-EKHO_Sigiriya-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.facebook.com/ekhosigiriya/', 'address': 'Sigiriya Road, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Sigiriya Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 18, 'count4': 48, 'count5': 142}}
text: If I could give this place 6 stars, I would. We made this booking last minute and were welcomed warmly. They let us check in early and upgraded the room. The room is lovely! There’s lots of places to put clothes and items, the a/c works well and there’s a ceiling fan, the bed is comfortable and the sheets are fresh, the shower is clean and warm. We had the Sri Lankan breakfast today and it was incredible. The pool area is calm and inviting. Special thank you to Shanta who has provided us with great care since we arrived. We would absolutely recommend Ekho Sigiriya!!!
title: 6 Star Sigiriya Hotel

roomTip: Highly Recommend this Hotel
text:
Very friendly and helpful staff.. We highly recommend this comfortable and accessible hotel. The food is high quality, and the breakfast is good, big, and tasty, particularly the scrambled eggs! Special requests and tailoring food to personal tastes is possible directly with the chef if required, just best to give advance notice of preferences and time desired for meals so that they can prep and make it as best as they can. Be sure to enjoy sitting on the veranda with view of the rock.

We were recommended this hotel by a friend and changed our booking from elsewhere last minute. We are so happy that we did and didn’t regret it for a moment and saved some money too! It’s beautifully and classically furnished, comfortable and a suitable place to hang out, and more than just sleep.
title: Friendly staff and lovely stay

placeInfo: {'id': '11979805', 'name': 'EKHO Sigiriya', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 220, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.95179, 'longitude': 80.75518, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d11979805-Reviews-EKHO_Sigiriya-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.facebook.com/ekhosigiriya/', 'address': 'Sigiriya Road, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Sigiriya Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 18, 'count4': 48, 'count5': 142}}
roomTip: If you don’t like talking to people this is the place for you I guess
text:
Stayed here for 2 nights luckily it wasn’t more than that.

Emailed the hotel asking about their laundry list twice no one bothered replying, guess what I showed up and asked about their laundry service, the receptionist only replied ‘no’, and when I further asked didn’t you advertised your property has a laundry service then he said ‘the machine is broken’. That’s got nothing to do with me right? You could’ve offered an alternative as in charging me your full price then you take it out somewhere to have them washed? I know hotels can do that since I worked in the industry.

Receptionist only took my passport and asked me to fill out the form, 0 explanation to what was included in the room plan (even my driver wondered why) 
Shower drainage was a disaster it was flooded, water pressure was so weak 
Internet was down for the 2 days that I stayed, the only place to have wifi service was in the lobby, which wasn’t consistent either.
Needed to wake up at 430 the next morning so I had to go to bed early, at 22:15 realized the air con was dripping water, went to the reception and it was already pitched dark, luckily their kitchen was still opened so I managed to get their guys to come check. What they did was simply turned up my air con and said it’s fixed. 10 minutes later of course it’s still dripping so I went out again and guess what, this time even the kitchen is closed.
I walked around the property trying to locate one staff - no one could been seen.
Went back to the room hoping to locate a hotel information directory- none, not even a phone in the room.
Called to the hotel main line no one picked it up.
Looked up the Ekho hotel official website dialed all the numbers given for 10 minutes eventually reached out to their Colombo HQ and he got someone over and switched me to another room. By the time all these messed up finished it was already 2315

Next day demanded to speak with the manager on site he offered lunch and dinner plus the laundry. I gave him the bill for the laundry and had dinner at the hotel. It was kinda like a test to see whether the message was being passed down. Nope. At check out they charged me for dinner. I just wanted the whole thing to be over didn’t even bother asking for the manager again. Oh and did I mention the new room have had the same air con issue but I only noticed it after switching it off as I was about to check out.

Seriously the only positive thing about this hotel was the location. Can you imagine not having ONE staff on ground to support what happens if there is an emergency? A simple signage which says call this number for any assistance needed during your stay, or to explain to the guest that your reception is closed after some certain hours at check in would’ve been helpful. 

I’ll avoid the EKHO group as a whole seriously.
title: No thanks

placeInfo: {'id': '11979805', 'name': 'EKHO Sigiriya', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 220, 'locationString': 'Sigiriya, Central Province', 'latitude': 7.95179, 'longitude': 80.75518, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304141-d11979805-Reviews-EKHO_Sigiriya-Sigiriya_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.facebook.com/ekhosigiriya/', 'address': 'Sigiriya Road, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Sigiriya Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Sigiriya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '21120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 18, 'count4': 48, 'count5': 142}}
roomTip: Mosquito repellent is a MUST
text:
Location: Excellent - Very close to restaurants and Sigiriya Rock

Rooms and toilet area: Clean and very well equipped 

Bathroom area: Walls and floor tiles need thorough cleaning

Garden/ pool area: Spacious, clean but be sure to have mosquito repellent on you

Food: By the time we got to the breakfast buffet (30 mins before closing) a lot of the items had finished and were not replenished. Whatever was available was cold and was covered with flies

Staff: This was the lowest point of the hotel. A property that has so much potential to have a much better rating loses out because the staff are some of the most inefficient, unhygienic staff I have ever come across. There were about 4 boys working - all huddled around the computer and not attending to guest. The buffet was covered in flies, and they didn't even seem to care. During checkout, it took a total of 3 members to complete the process. But the worst was the lack of basic hygiene - terrible BO, unmaintained hair/ beard, coughing out onto documents. I can't completely put the blame onto these guys and should mention that it is up to the management to train their staff on such basic things. But a big thank you to them for calling us to let us know the buffet was closing in 30 mins.

Price: The direct price on  basis BB was LKR 37k, which is definitely not worth it, but thanks to an offer on Agoda we got it for 21k (nett), which made it a win!
title: Staff need to be trained WELL!

text:
it's said to be a 4 star property but it it was not worth couple of stars 
reasons why I dint like ekho sigiriya 
1. the telephone was not working and they dint make a effort to correct it we had to keep walking down to the reception to ask or order anything 
2. any basic hotels also provides you withe a dental kit yet ekho sigiriya dint have nor made any efforts 
3. there was roaches in and around the bedroom n bathroom 
4. they could not bother to put up a warm buffet for the guest they will force you to choose with limited options which was terrible and same for the dinner 
I will not recommend anyone for this property 
but ya the location was amazing  and the property works buy they really need to buck up their facilities and services.
title: Quaint place with issues
